body.name: Rapid Care First Aid 839-1-12AN Premium Commercial Grade 25 Person First Aid Kit, Exceeds OSHA/ANSI 2015 Standards, in Detachable Wall Mountable Poly Case

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Rapid Care First Aid Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 24 mins
features: This premium commercial grade 25 person first aid kit exceeds OSHA and ANSI 2015 standards. It comes with 130 pieces, and is designed for most environments, including offices, fleet vehicles, manufacturing facilities and work sites.
The only safety first aid kit that includes a CPR barrier which protects rescuers from exposure to infection when in close contact with victims.

Excellent for use in industrial or construction work areas where accidents can happen at any time. With this in mind, we have included a blood stopper for any emergencies. This commercial first aid kit is used frequently in construction sites, workshops, sports centers, manufacturing facilities, warehouses, restaurants, etc.

Kit includes: 20 plastic bandages (1" x 3"), 20 fabric bandages (1" x 3"), 5 fabric knuckle bandages, 5 fabric fingertip bandages, 2 fabric bandages (2" x 3"), 20 alcohol pads, 10 antiseptic towelettes, 2" gauze roll, 4 gauze pads (3” x 3”), instant cold compress, triangular bandage, 2 safety pins, 4 exam gloves, 2 trauma pads, blood stopper, CPR barrier, 2 finger splints, 10 applicators, 2 eye washes (15ml), 2 eye pads, tape roll, 10 antibiotic cream, 10 burn cream/gel packets, burn dressing (4" x 4"), tweezers, scissors, first aid guide.
Easy to install detachable wall mount, for quick access in an emergency. Mounting hardware provided. Kit measures 11.2" X 8.8" X 4.0".
body.description: Rapid Care First Aid 839-1-12AN Premium Commercial Grade 25 Person First Aid Kit. Exceeds OSHA/ANSI 2015 Standards. Kit includes 130 pieces of essential items to keep you and your workplace safe at all times: 20 plastic bandages (1" x 3"), 20 fabric bandages (1" x 3"), 5 fabric knuckle bandages, 5 fabric fingertip bandages, 2 fabric bandages (2" x 3"), 20 alcohol pads, 10 antiseptic towelettes, 2" gauze roll, 4 gauze pads (3” x 3”), instant cold compress, triangular bandage, 2 safety pins, 4 exam gloves, 2 trauma pads, blood stopper, CPR barrier, 2 finger splints, 10 applicators, 2 eye washes (15ml), 2 eye pads, tape roll, 10 antibiotic cream, 10 burn cream/gel packets, burn dressing (4" x 4"), tweezers, scissors, first aid guide.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Instant Access When It Matters Most Transparent Case Built tough and durable, this Rapid Care First Aid Kit case also features a see-through front for full visibilityEasily track when the First Aid Kit materials are in need of replenishmentImmediately locate the materials needed in emergency situations Instant Access When It Matters Most Unitized & Color Coded Contents within are housed in color coded packages for clear organizationPaired with the see-through case, the color coded packs allow for instant location of required itemsKeep items housed in their packs for less clutter within the poly case Instant Access When It Matters Most Detachable Wall Mount The Poly Case offers the option to mount to any typical wall - allowing for an even quicker access to itemsSecure the Rapid Care First Aid Kit to your specified area and never worry about misplacing the Kit in times of emergency Instant Access When It Matters Most Easy Carry Handle This Rapid Care First Aid Kit features an easy to carry handle for on-the-go scenariosEase of transportation allows the Kit to be brought anywhereAdditional Poly Fastening Clips are added to secure the front door of the case

Rapid Care's Premium Unitized First Aid Kit Provides 130 pieces to assist with a wide range of injuries Includes 20 Extreme Hold Bandages & Blood Stop Dressings for Serious InjurySpecialty Items added such as: CPR Barrier, Trauma Pad, 6 Antibiotic Ointments, 6 Burn Creams, Instant Cold Compress, 2 Eye Pads, and Eye WashSee Bullet Point Section Above for a Full List of Rapid Care First Aid Kit Contents

Your Health Is Our First Priority Rapid Care offers a full line of first aid kits for every possible occasion and use. We know our products need to perform during that critical moment, be it a minor bruise on the soccer field, or a more serious injury from an auto accident. So every Rapid Care First Aid kit is designed with purpose and manufactured with care, so it will be there when you need it most. No one knows when an injury is going to happen. Keep a Rapid Care First Aid kit close at hand so you'll be ready. Rapid Care First Aid was founded with one focus - the health and safety of our customers. We know they depend on our products to perform during every type of emergency situation. When it is needed most, Rapid Care is there for its customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great First Aid Kit
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my First Aid Kit for my Boy Scout Troop's Trailer. The wall mount is very nice and the kit comes loaded with high quality supplies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received both kits last week and although everything seems to be intact. The outside of each case was covered in a sticky brown goo; it eventually came off surprisingly without taking off the verbiage, but I really had to scrub to get them clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: arrived without a closure clasp . once item is opened it will not close agan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beware of missing pieces
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 3 for use in areas around my church. Two of them arrived with mounting bracket but 1 did not. Guess we'll have to duct tape it to wall or risk it being misplaced

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: My son owns a glass business. They of course have first aid products in the office but I purchased this so he would have a reliable first aid kit in his truck for treatment at the job site. He has not has the need to use it yet but undoubtedly that time will come and they will be prepared.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for what ever!!!!
reviews.reviewText: all around very good case!!! received everything upgraded some things!!! overall very pleased!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for work.
reviews.reviewText: I buy these to put in utility trucks at work.
